casebody.data:
IN RE: Alexander WHITE No. 283P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Alexander White, for White, Alexander.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st of August 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, New Hanover County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
